abstract: The chief executive of Wells Fargo, John Stumpf, whose company acquired Wachovia, said on Wednesday that minimizing job losses would be a priority but added that some cuts would begin this year.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Wells Fargo, John Stumpf, whose company acquired Wachovia, said on Wednesday that minimizing job losses would be a priority but added that some cuts would begin this year.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Chief Sees Job Cuts After Wachovia Deal
